name: Cosmos Quest I
description: Year: Far in the future. Location: Yellow Fog Galaxy, somewhere on the bridge between Rhomul System and the peripheral rings of the Federation. The Sun slowly fade out under submission of a black hole that no one knew before. Executing your duties as an engineer in a crew that observes the temperature of the Sun, you (Apo Lanski) notice a small problem with the shuttle when you just started your night shift. Landing on a small planet called Zhena was a wise move, because your shuttle is an old 3rd generation machine…
